ygData.subject: Re: Suggested monk improvements
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From:  To:  Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 10:21 AM Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Suggested monk improvements ...
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: <Felizpunk@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 10:21 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Suggested monk improvements


> From: Felizpunk@...
>
> In a message dated 9/7/99 6:40:14 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
FizbanJ@...
> writes:
>
> << Monks do do the MOST damage. I have a level 46 monk friend who can
> routinely
> steal kills from 49-50 wizards using Ice Comet. Take that you damn kill
> stealing wizards!!
> >>
>
> ummmn... No...


Actually yes, that is quite possible... since the fact that ice comet takes
so long to cast, monks have plenty of time to pummel in a good 500-700 dmg,
which very easily could be more then half of the MoBs HP therefore giving
him the kill instead of the wizzie woh just just wasted a 900 mana spell...
>

>
> ONElist: your connection to online communities.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
